Talk1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I have a reward for you, and it's too much
for these pockets to handle.

No need to be humble. You deserve this!
Talk1008: <sp:3:0:2:0800>I have been waiting for those very words!
Talk1040:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease_00><clr:0000>The road has been blocked<clr:ffff> by some rocks
that tumbled out of the sky.

I thought maybe we could drive over it,
and we did make it about halfway.

But the rubble's just too much trouble.
<clr:0000>No horses can get past it.<clr:ffff> <sp:5:0:0>And our little
jaunt took its toll, alas...
Talk1041:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>If you keep distracting me, I won't be
able to conduct properly!

And without my conducting, the players
won't know what to do!

<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Er? <sp:5:0:0>How odd. <sp:5:0:0>They're going on without me.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>


<sp:3:0:2:0701>W-well, never mind, then. <sp:5:0:0>Are you that
interested in the <clr:0000>Great Fairy Kaysa<clr:ffff>?
Talk1043:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Notice_00>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> If your path happens to take you in
<clr:0000>the direction of Faron<clr:ffff>...

Maybe you could make a quick stop at
<clr:0000>Highland Stable<clr:ffff> and ask about the <clr:0000>sound
of that flute<clr:ffff>?
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>But if you're not going that way, <sp:5:0:0>don't
trouble yourself on my account.
Talk1044:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Ah! It's you! <sp:5:0:0>Look—I mean listen—to this!


Pyper's here! Our flautist Pyper has made
his triumphant return!
Talk1045:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Who knew how smitten Pyper really was?


<sp:0:2:2:5000>Not I. Affairs of the heart are something I've yet
to experience firsthand.<sp:0:2:2:6400>

<sp:3:0:2:0401>Well, anyway.


<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL>The return of Pyper's delightful flute has
revitalized the Stable Trotters! We're
ready to make some music!
Talk1032:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease>I can't remember the last time I saw the
Great Fairy come out of her flower bud.

I believe the exquisite tones of Pyper's
flute would rouse her, but...
Talk1033:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think>Sure enough, this <clr:0000>Great Fairy<clr:ffff> has also<sp:5:0:0>
withdrawn into her flower bud.

She used to enjoy hearing <clr:0000>the sound of
Pyper's flute<clr:ffff>, but...
Talk1046:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But I'd better save some energy for the
performance and not fritter it all away
on chatting.
By the way...<sp:5:0:0>I remember you, traveler.
Are you here out of concern for the
<clr:0000>Great Fairy<clr:ffff>?
0002: Let's take it from the top.
Talk1034:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Poor Breezer, the indispensable sixth
member of our troupe, has broken down
yet again.
Our Breezer has seen us through thick
and thin. <sp:5:0:0>Without it, our hearts won't be
in our performance.
Talk1021:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I can't possibly abandon the <clr:0000>Great Fairy<clr:ffff>...


Pyper has returned, and I'm sure she will
enjoy his performance.
Talk1047:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice>The <clr:0000>Great Fairy<clr:ffff> is at the top of that hill.


The green flower bud is the landmark to
look out for. Let's head to her quickly,
and with a song in our hearts!
Talk1022:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_01>No? Am I wrong?


You're not here to meet with the
<clr:0000>Great Fairy Kaysa<clr:ffff>? Perhaps you came
here to visit Outskirt Stable.
Talk1048: <sp:3:0:2:0a01>I'm afraid Pyper...<sp:5:0:0>isn't with us right now...
Talk1035: <sp:3:0:2:0701>The <clr:0000>Great Fairy<clr:ffff> is at the top of that hill.
Talk1023:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm sorry to say the <clr:0000>Great Fairy<clr:ffff> here
has also withdrawn into her flower bud
and hasn't come out in a while.
She must be scared to appear, just like
what happened at Woodland Stable.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>This Great Fairy used to enjoy hearing
<clr:0000>Pyper<clr:ffff> play in our troupe. She loved the
sweet notes of <clr:0000>his flute<clr:ffff>.
So, I'm sure the<clr:0000> sound of his flute<clr:ffff> would
cheer her up now,<sp:5:0:0> but...
Talk1036:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Without dear <clr:0000>Breezer<clr:ffff>, our hearts just
aren't in our performances.

But how else are we meant to get <clr:0000>near
the Great Fairy<clr:ffff>?
Talk1010: <sp:3:0:2:0700>This seems dangerous. Go back, go back!
Talk1049:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>The captivating Kaysa is now at peace!


But she wasn't the last Great Fairy still
shut away in her flower bud.

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_00>That's why the show must go on to the
next Great Fairy's hiding place!

Thank you once again, traveler!
Talk1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>It's always a thrill to ride to our next
destination!
Talk1025:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>Yes, goodbye...


<sp:3:0:2:0b01>Wait, goodbye?! But we only just
said hello!

No goodbyes for you until I tell you
about the <clr:0000>Great Fairy<clr:ffff>.
Talk1039:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I tried many different ways to find a safe
path to that destination. 

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>They all ended in failure. Worse yet, our
poor Breezer broke down.
Talk1013: <sp:3:0:2:0b00>Is there trouble?! I do hate trouble!
Talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_01>Aha! ♪I know that face! Yes, that's a
face I know!♪

Traveler! Have you come to meet with
another <clr:0000>Great Fairy<clr:ffff>?
Talk1014:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Greaaat Fairyyy! We're here!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


Now prepare for the performance of
a lifetime!
Talk1027:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>That's better. <sp:5:0:0>Now I can concentrate on
our performance!
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>How dangerous! I thought I'd be reunited
with my dear, old grandpapa if that went
on much longer.
We'd better try that again.
Talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I'm thankful <clr:0000>Pyper <clr:ffff>has returned...<clr:0000><clr:ffff>


But I'm so worried about the Great Fairy
that<sp:5:0:0>...I just can't lead the players with
my usual flair.
Talk1028:
Everyone, get on board before he
changes his mind!
Talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_01>Oh, Pyper is a young flautist with the
Stable Trotters.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>But one day he took his leave from the
troupe, and we haven't seen him since.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><sp:0:2:2:5000>A traveler from <clr:0000>Faron<clr:ffff> to the southeast said they
heard the <clr:0000>sound of a flute<clr:ffff> at <clr:0000>Highland Stable<clr:ffff>, but...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk1017: <sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Oooh. I didn't know she'd be so shiny!
